Rulings.Edison:
●You can activate “Trojan Blast” when a face-down monster shifts, such as with “Creature Swap”. But no damage will be inflicted because it was face-down.
●You can't activate “Trojan Blast” when a monster shifts control to become an Equip Card. So you can't activate “Trojan Blast” when “Relinquished” or “Allure Queen” equips itself with your monster.
●“Trojan Blast” is not a targeting effect. Select the monster when “Trojan Blast” resolves.

Rulings.Base: 1. You can activate "Trojan Blast" when a face-down monster shifts, such as with "Creature Swap". But no damage will be inflicted because it was face-down.\n2. You cannot activate "Trojan Blast" when a monster shifts control to become an Equip Card. So you cannot activate "Trojan Blast" when "Relinquished" or "Allure Queen" equips itself with your monster.\n3. "Trojan Blast" is not a targeting effect. Select the monster when "Trojan Blast" resolves.

PSCT.Base: Activate only when an opponent's card effect shifts control of a monster from your side of the field to theirs. Destroy that 1 monster and inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.
